p1.title: Who am I?
p1.text: I am a web developer, focusing on front-end development. Currently, I'm working with Nuxt and Tailwind, and I'm also studying Next.js. I'm also studying back-end development with Django and FastAPI.

p2.title: What am I looking for?
p2.text: I'm looking for opportunities to work with web development, focusing on front-end development. I'm also looking for opportunities to work with Python and C/C++.

p3.title: What am I studying?
p3.text: I'm studying web development with Nuxt and Tailwind, and I'm also studying Next.js. I'm also studying back-end development with Django and FastAPI. I'm also studying C/C++ and Python.

frontend.title: Front-end
frontend.text: I have experience with front-end development, working with Nuxt and Tailwind. I'm also studying Next.js and Svelte.

backend.title: Back-end
backend.text: I'm studying back-end development with Django and FastAPI. I'm also studying Python and C/C++.

other.title: Tools and Other Skills
other.text: I have experience with DevOps, working with Git and Docker.
